response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and significance for us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. Given its unique attributes and the impact it can have on your endeavors, we are offering it to you at a special price of $1,200,000. We understand its worth to you is $1,000,000, but we hope this offer will be favorable and beneficial for both parties. Should you choose to accept this offer, it will unlock a world of possibilities and opportunities tailored to your needs and aspirations. If you need more information or have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
